mapper.select: select dr.rating, ds.scheduledate, h.hotelname, d.diningname, dr.content from diningschedule ds, diningreview dr, diningbooking db, dining d, hotel h, member m where db.id='member1' and db.id(+)=m.id and dr.bookingcode(+)=db.bookingcode and db.schedulecode(+)=ds.schedulecode and ds.diningcode(+)=d.diningcode and d.hotelcode(+)=h.hotelcode
